overview.base: Having mastered the basic techniques in this field of magic, you are able to cast more advanced @L[Category:Spells]{spells}. If you create any @L[Core:Elder Sorcery]{Elder Sorcery} @L[Category:Spells]{spells} of your own, they get added to this list. However, just because you "know" how to cast these spells, doesn't mean you are always prepared to. Although all @L[Category:Mage classes]{mage classes} grant their own elder sorcery and rotator spells, you may only have a maximum of 2 Ã— (@L[Category:Mage classes]{MR} - 1) of these spells rotated into your spell list at any given time across all classes. @L[Category:Mage classes]{MR} refers to the number of @L[Core:Leveling Up]{ranks} you have in @L[Category:Mage classes]{mage classes}. During a @L[Core:Long Rest]{long rest}, you can "rotate" which spells you have prepared. The @L[Category:Rotator spells]{rotator spells} automatically available to you are @L[Ability:Bellows]{Bellows}, @L[Ability:Control and Resist Fire]{Control and Resist Fire}, @L[Ability:Crown of Flame]{Crown of Flame}, @L[Ability:Melting Grasp]{Melting Grasp}, and @L[Ability:Rupture Mark]{Rupture Mark}.
overview.proficient: You may instead prepare @L[Core:Proficiency Bonus]{P} of these @L[Category:Spells]{spells}.
overview.fluent: You may instead prepare @L[Core:Fluency Bonus]{F} of these @L[Category:Spells]{spells}.

overview.base: The next @L[Category:Spells]{spell} you cast that would deal @L[Core:Damage]{damage} is @L[Keyword:Boosted]{boosted}.

system.heightened: For each additional @L[Core:MP]{MP} spent, the next @L[Category:Spells]{spell} you cast is @L[Keyword:Boosted]{boosted} again.

overview.base: Your @L[Core:Damage]{standard damage} increases by [[/damage 1d4[fire magic]]] @L[Core:Damage]{damage}. You also @L[Keyword:Resistance]{resist} @L[Damage:Fire]{fire damage}.
A small circle of smokeless fire circles above your head. You gain @L[Ability:Burning Touch]{Burning Touch} and @L[Ability:Inferno Aura]{Inferno Aura}.

results.critHit: Double the @L[Core:Damage]{damage dice} dealt by this @L[Category:Abilities]{ability}.

system.heightened: For each additional @L[Core:MP]{MP} spent, deal an additional [[/damage 1d6[magic fire]]] @L[Core:Damage]{damage}.
For each additional @L[Core:MP]{MP} spent, deal an additional [[/damage 1d6[magic fire]]] @L[Core:Damage]{damage}.

results.hit: Target's next @L[Category:Conjured spells]{conjured spell} does not trigger @L[Category:Reaction abilities]{reactions}.
